settings.title: PRECISION DELIVERY SYSTEM
settings.text: Where topical creams have to fight their way through the skin's barrier layer, our round patches are coated in hundreds of crystal tips which painlessly pass through and dissolve into your skin.

settings.title: FAST ACTING
settings.text: Each MicroCrystal tip is formed with a blend of spot-busting active ingredients. The concentrated formula melts into skin over two hours to fight spots at their core.

settings.title: VISIBLE RESULTS
settings.text: Designed for hormonal zits, early-stage pimples and deep under-the-skin spots. With noticeable changes in size, colour and pressure. Get to work from just two hours.

settings.heading: Key Components
settings.row_content:
Madecassoside is known for its potential to target and reduce spots at their source. Madecassoside is derived from Centella asiatica, a plant with skincare benefits, and is often used for its anti-inflammatory and skin-regenerating properties. It's recognized for its ability to help improve skin texture, reduce redness, and support the skin's healing process, making it a beneficial ingredient for addressing various types of skin concerns, including spots and blemishes.

Zinc lactate is known for its potential benefits in targeting and reducing spots. It possesses anti-inflammatory properties and helps regulate sebum production, making it effective in managing oily skin and reducing the occurrence of breakouts. Additionally, it promotes skin healing, reduces redness, and has antimicrobial properties, making it beneficial for addressing various types of skin blemishes and spots.

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.row_content:
Applying to clean, dry skin, press each MicroMask onto the skin firmly (press, do not rub). Ensure the centre of the MicroMask is fully pressed to activate the crystal tips.

Leave on for at least 2 hours, ideally overnight, allowing the MicroCrystals to fully dissolve and release the actives deep into the skin where they can be most effective.

settings.heading: Description
settings.row_content:
Advanced pimple patches designed to tackle stubborn hormonal zits, early-stage pimples and deep under-the-skin spots. The microneedles release powerful ingredients that visibly change the spot’s appearance, colour and size from just two hours. Skin is left feeling soothed and calm, with a clearer complexion. 

Each patch features 500 self-dissolving microneedles, which painlessly penetrate the skin to reach spots at their source. As you press on the patch, the needles melt into the skin allowing for fast absorption of active ingredients and quicker results. 

Each microneedle is made from high-quality ingredients to treat deep-rooted spots. Salicylic acid purifies the skin, while reducing oil production and soothing irritation. Totarol is rich in antioxidants and antimicrobial properties, strengthening the skin’s defences against toxins to prevent further breakouts. Green tea extract is renowned for its ability to break down bacteria, clear pores and cleanse the skin, while also reducing redness. 

Our efficient and easy-to-use pimple patches deliver targeted treatment to where it’s needed most, whether it’s breakout zones or solitary spots. Simply place the patch on the target area and press gently.
